question: Which Indian sportsperson has bagged gold in the men's 25m Rapid Fire Pistol event at the 2018 ISSF Junior Shooting World Cup in Sydney?
explanation: Rising shooter Anish Bhanwala from India has bagged gold medal in the men\'s 25m Rapid Fire Pistol event at the ISSF Junior Shooting World Cup in Sydney, Australia on March 27, 2018. With this, he secured 3rd individual gold medal for India in the tournament.
